scripts.build: tar -czvf cssow-stack.build.tar.gz docker-compose.yml docker-build--all.sh docker-build--cssow-db.sh docker-build--student-web.sh docker-build--teacher-web.sh docker-clean.sh db/backups --exclude=tests.py --exclude=node_modules --exclude=tests --exclude=schemeofwork_tests --exclude=__tests__ src/modules src/teacher_web src/student_web && git add cssow-stack.build.tar.gz && git commit -m 'build: create cssow-stack.build.tar.gz'
